Sentencas: The aim of the paper is to investigate possible improvements in the geometry design of a monolithic solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) through analysis of the entropy generation terms.
Titulo: Entropy generation analysis in a monolithic-type solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: The different contributions to the local rate of entropy generation are calculated using a computational fluid dynamic (CFD) model of the fuel cell, accounting for energy transfer, fluid dynamics, current transfer, chemical reactions and electrochemistry.
Titulo: Entropy generation analysis in a monolithic-type solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: The fuel cell geometry is then modified to reduce the main sources of irreversibility and increase its efficiency.
Titulo: Entropy generation analysis in a monolithic-type solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)
